overview: 1 - Angela White has been unhappily married to her husband ever since he refused to give her what sheâ€™s always wanted: anal sex.  2 - As the CFO of a top financial firm, Johnny Sins has no problem firing employee Smith for his below-average efforts.  3 - Jaclyn's fiance doesn't want to pay for her to get a personal trainer before the wedding, so he asks his buddy Keiran to help her out.  4 - Ivy and her husband are celebrating their anniversary with a trip to Vegas, but they can't agree on how to have a good time.  5 - On first glance Alektra Blue may seem like nothing more than a bitchy wife, but she has a gameplan: antagonize her husband Keiran so that he gives her the rough Valentine's Day fucking she so desperately craves.  6 - Alexis loves to entertain. Tonight she's hosting her husband's new boss and his lovely wife, Adriana. Alexis's husband knows she'll do just about anything to show her guests a good time, but how far will she be willing to go tonight?
title: Horny Housewives 7
